title: Hour 1: Trey Area
description:
In this episode, Jay Williams, Monica McNutt, Bart Scott, and Robert Griffin III give their takes on whether or not the 49ers can contend with the reigning Super Bowl champions with Trey Lance at the helm after San Francisco gave Jimmy G permission to seek a trade. Also discussed is which AFC West QB is under the most pressure this season? The crew debates which NFL team is in the best position for the next 3 years. In the wake of James Harden's deal to stay in Philly, the crew debates where the 76ers land among teams in the East. Plus, Stephen A is always watching...

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: Hour 1: Can the 49ers challenge the Rams in the NFC West?
